cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.16)
project(lua LANGUAGES C)

set(LUA_SOURCES
    lapi.c
    lauxlib.c
    lbaselib.c
    lcode.c
    lcorolib.c
    lctype.c
    ldblib.c
    ldebug.c
    ldo.c
    ldump.c
    lfunc.c
    lgc.c
    linit.c
    liolib.c
    llex.c
    lmathlib.c
    lmem.c
    loadlib.c
    lobject.c
    lopcodes.c
    loslib.c
    lparser.c
    lstate.c
    lstring.c
    lstrlib.c
    ltable.c
    ltablib.c
    ltm.c
    lundump.c
    lutf8lib.c
    lvm.c
    lzio.c
)

add_library(lua STATIC ${LUA_SOURCES})

target_include_directories(lua PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})

# Suppress warnings for third-party code
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(lua PRIVATE /W0)
else()
    target_compile_options(lua PRIVATE -w)
endif()
